hero.description: Bixinta waxbarasho Islaam oo qaabaysan oo carruur-friendly ah jiilka soo socda. Waxaan diirada saarayaa aqoonta saxda ah, dhisida dabeecadda, iyo heerka waxbarasho ee ugu sarreeya sida Qur'aanka iyo Sunnada.

parent1.text: Wiilkaygu wuu isbadalay gebi ahaanba tan iyo markuu ku biiraray Markaz-Almubarak. Dabeecadiisa, nidaamkiisa, iyo jacaylkiisa Qur'aanka ayaa aad u koray.

parent2.text: Macallimiintu waa dad aqoon badan, dulqaad leh, oo run ahaantii daryeela horumarka ilmo kasta. Ma heli kari lahaa waxbarasho Islaam oo ka wanaagsan tan gabadhaydii.

parent3.text: Arkitaanka carruurta iga qalin jabiya Xifdh-ka ayaa ahaa wakhtiga aan ugu faraxsanaa noloshaydii. JazakAllah khair guud ahaan kooxda.

parent4.text: Manhajka habaysan iyo deegaanka daryeelka leh ayaa sameeyay farqi dhammaan. Gabadheennu waxay jeceshahay inay fasalka tagto maalin kasta!

trustMetrics.heading: Dhisida Kalsoonida Iyada oo Loo Marayo
trustMetrics.description: Sanado badan oo ay ku dadaaleen waxbarashada Islaamka ee saxda ah ayaa nagu dhigtay xarun lagu kalsoon yahay bulshada dhexdeeda.

fastTrack.title: Waxbarasho Degdeg ah
fastTrack.description: Barnaamijyo degdeg ah ardayda dadaalka badan

goalOriented.title: Ujeedo Wato
goalOriented.description: Tilmaamo cad iyo la socodka guulaha

programs.heading: Waxbarasho Islaam oo
programs.description: Manhaj dhamaystiran oo loogu talagalay in lagu kormiyo koboca ruuxiga iyo heerka waxbarasho ee ardayda.

quranMemorization.title: Xasuusinta Qur'aanka
quranMemorization.subtitle: Barnaamijka Xifdhiga
quranMemorization.description: Xasuusin nidaam leh oo diiradda saarta hayista, fahamka, iyo xiriirka ruuxiga ah ee erayada Alle iyada oo la adeegsanayo habab la xaqiijiyay.

hadithStudies.title: Waxbarashada Xadiiska
hadithStudies.subtitle: Raacitaanka Sunnada
hadithStudies.description: Sahaminaya hadalka iyo ficilada Nabiga Muhammad ﷺ si loo helo hago nolol maalmeedka ah oo leh ilo la xaqiijiyay.

qiraatTajweed.title: Qira'at & Tajwiid
qiraatTajweed.subtitle: Akhriska Quruxda badan
qiraatTajweed.description: Xirfadaha xeerarka akhriska saxda ah iyo qurxinta aayaadka Qur'aanka iyada oo leh tababar takhasusnimo leh.

aqeedahFiqh.title: Aqiidah & Fiqh Islaamka
aqeedahFiqh.subtitle: Caqiido & Xukumo
aqeedahFiqh.description: Dhisida aasaas adag oo caqiidada Islaamka ah iyo fahamka xukumada diinta ee nolol maalmeedka.

islamicCharacter.title: Dabeecadda Islaamka
islamicCharacter.subtitle: Akhlaq & Edeb
islamicCharacter.description: Kobcinta dabeecad sharaf leh, nidaam, iyo shakhsi u adeegsada oo salka ku haya tacliinta Islaamka.

arabicLanguage.title: Luuqadda Carabiga
arabicLanguage.subtitle: Luuqadda Qur'aanka
arabicLanguage.description: Fahamka luuqadda waxyaabaha la soo dejiyo si loo qooriyo aragga ruuxiga ah iyo fahamka qoraallada Islaamka.

islamicHistory.title: Taariikhda Islaamka
islamicHistory.subtitle: Sheekooyinka Nabiyada
islamicHistory.description: Wax ka bartida nolosha Nabiyada iyo asxaabta si loo dhiirigeliyo loona hago dhalinyarada Muslimka ah ee casriga ah.

duaAdhkar.title: Ducada & Adhkaarka
duaAdhkar.subtitle: Xusuusta Maalinle
duaAdhkar.description: Xasuusinta ducooyin iyo baryo muhiim ah ee xiriirka maalinle ee ruuxiga ah ee Alle.

fiqhWorship.title: Fiqhka Caabudka
fiqhWorship.subtitle: Islaamka Ficliga ah
fiqhWorship.description: Daraasad faahfaahsan oo ku saabsan hawlaha caabudka Islaamka oo ay ku jiraan Salaadda, Soonka, Zakada, iyo Xajka.

contactTeam.heading: Ma Heli kartid Waxaad Raadineyso?
contactTeam.description: Waxaan bixinaa barnaamijyo gaara loo habeeyay baahiyaha ilmahaaga. Nala soo xidhiidh si aan ugala wadahadalno waddooyin waxbarasho gaara ah.

whyChooseUs.heading: Maxay U Doorataa
whyChooseUs.description: Xarunta waxbarashada Islaamka ee la kalsoon yahay oo u adeegta bulshada Eastleigh iyaga oo leh heerkulka sare iyo dadaal.

reason1.title: Deegaan Carruur-Saaxiibeed
reason1.description: Meelo ammaan ah, nadiif ah, oo soo dhaweyn leh oo si gaar ah loogu qaabeeyay in barashayaasha yaryar ay ku kobcaan oo ku noolaadaan safarkooda Islaamka.

reason2.title: Manhaj Qaabaysan
reason2.description: Casharado da'da u habboon oo hubinaya horumar joogto ah iyo faham dhamaystiran oo aqoonta Islaamka ah oo leh habab la xaqiijiyay.

reason3.title: Fasallo Yaryar
reason3.description: Dareen gaar ah oo ilmo kasta, hubinaya in aan arday la tegin meelna fasalkooda waxbarashada 1:15 macalin iyo arday.

reason4.title: Kalsoonida Bulshada Eastleigh
reason4.description: Toddoba sano oo u adeegis qoysaska Nairobi iyagoo leh daacadnimo, run ahaanshiyaha, iyo heerkulka diinta ee waxbarashada Islaamka.

reason5.title: Macallimiin Shahaado leh
reason5.description: Dhammaan macallimiinteena waa kuwo shahaado leh, khibrad leh, oo jacayl u qaba barbaarinta jiilka soo socda ee barashayaasha Muslimka ah.

reason6.title: Jadwal Dabacsanaan leh
reason6.description: Fadhi subax iyo galabnimo ayaa la heli karaa si loogu habbeeyo jadwalka qoyska kala duwan iyo helitaanka ardayda.

registration.heading: Isdiiwaangeli Sanadka 2024/2025
registration.description: Meelahu way yaraadeen. Aamin u hel ilmahaaga meel ku jirta qaadashada soo socota oo sii ugu hadiyadee aqoonta Islaamka ee saxda ah.
registration.disclaimer: Markii aad soo gudbiso, waxaad ogolaanaysaa inaad hesho macluumaadka isdiiwaangelinta

videoTour.heading: Qaado Dalxiis Virtual ah
videoTour.description: Arag xarumahayaga, kula kulam macallimiinta, oo la kulanto waxa Markaz-Almubarak gaara ka dhigaya.

successStories.heading: Dhaxalka
successStories.description: U dabbaaldagida tilmaamaha iyo aqoonsiga bulshada tan iyo aasaaskayaga 2017.

achievement1.title: Qalin-jabinaha Sannadkasta
achievement1.description: U murugaysanaya ardaydayada Xifdh-ga xafladaha waaweyn ee culimo maxalliga ah iyo hogaamiyeyaasha bulshada.

achievement2.title: Ka Qaybqaadashada Waalidiinta
achievement2.description: Aqoon isweydaarsiyo joogto ah iyo shir-wadaallo si loo buuxiyo farqiga u dhexeeya waxbarashada guriga iyo waxbarashada machadka.

achievement3.title: Aqoonsi Goboleed
achievement3.description: Loo tiriyay mid ka mid ah xarumaha Eastleigh ugu kalsoon ee aqoonta Islaamka ee saxda ah iyo waxbarashada.

cta.heading: Sii Ilmahaaga Hadiyadda
cta.description: Ku biir boqolaal qoys oo Eastleigh ah oo u dhiibay koboca ruuxiga ah ee carruurtooda iyo waxbarashada Islaamka Markaz-Almubarak.
benefits: Soo-booqasho aan ballan lahayn ayaa lagu soo dhaweynayaa

footer.tagline: Barbaarinta qalbiga Ummadda aqoonta saxda ah sida Qur'aanka iyo Sunnada.

contactInfo.heading: Macluumaadka Xiriirka
contactInfo.hoursText: Isn - Jim: 8:00 AM - 4:00 PM\nSab: 9:00 AM - 1:00 PM

newsletter.heading: Sii Cusbooneysii
newsletter.description: Ku qor warqaddayada si aad u hesho wararka dhacdooyinka, barnaamijyada, iyo kheyraadka Islaamka.

footer.copyright: © 2024 Markaz-Almubarak Xarunta Waxbarashada Islaamka. Dhammaan xuquuqda way dhawran yihiin.
